thread.title: Rodgers Signs Multi-Year Extension with Prevea
thread.title_full: Rodgers Signs Multi-Year Extension with Prevea - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Rodgers Signs Multi-Year Extension with Prevea
text:
Prevea Health
GREEN BAY, Wis. , Oct. 7, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Green Bay-based health care provider Prevea (pronouncer: PRE-VAY-UH) Health and Aaron Rodgers have agreed to partner for another four years of promoting health throughout northeastern and western Wisconsin . The two started their official partnership in 2012 when Rodgers was first featured as Prevea's voice of wellness.
"Our partnership with Aaron and the way we care for patients is truly unique in the health care industry," said Ashok Rai , MD, Prevea Health President and CEO. "Instead of paying actors to tell people what we will do to them once they're already sick, we have this incredible opportunity to partner with a sports star in a campaign designed to improve wellness. Prevea offers some of the area's most advanced specialties to care for the sickest of patients when they need us, but Aaron shares our overall belief that the community is best served when we focus our communications on increasing our area's overall quality of life."
Now in their fourth year of working together, Rodgers and Prevea recently produced and launched a new campaign focused on helping people get ahead of their own wellness by mapping out their health plan. The communications encourage viewers to visualize "healthy" as a destination – a great place to be.
"A big part of why I love our partnership is that people see how much Prevea cares about them," said Rodgers. "Prevea is changing the way people look at health care, and I'm happy to be part of that process. I hope that I'm able to give back in a way that players in Green Bay have done before me. As a veteran in the league, I feel it's my responsibility to pass on knowledge."
"Health is paramount to Aaron's success, which makes this partnership with Prevea so authentic," said Rodgers' marketing agent Mark Steinberg , partner, Excel Sports Management. "Both are pillars in Wisconsin , and together they will continue to champion the well-being of the community."
Click here to watch "Get There" and click here to watch "What's It Mean" – Rodgers' latest commercials with Prevea. The commercials air in the Green Bay, WI and LaCrosse/ Eau Claire, WI DMAs.
About Prevea Health
Prevea Health's mission is to care for people with passion, pride, and respect. Founded in 1996, Prevea Health partners with HSHS hospitals in Green Bay , Sheboygan , Oconto Falls , Eau Claire and Chippewa Falls and provides access to more than 220 physicians in more than 60 specialty areas. Prevea has more than 38 locations extending from Marinette and Sturgeon Bay to Oostburg in Northeastern Wisconsin , and in the Chippewa Valley in Western Wisconsin . For more information, visit www.prevea.com .
